portfolio.title: Automated Essay Scoring
portfolio.description: The collaborative research project to implement a system addressing efficiency issues in scoring essay assignments. The system was created using a machine learning model and deployed on Streamlit with a relational SQL Database.

portfolio.title: NIAS POSSI
portfolio.description: This project aimed to facilitate the Persatuan Olahraga Selam Seluruh Indonesia (POSSI) to track their member using ID Card called Nomor Induk Atlet Selam (NIAS) and records the participant of competition held by that organization

portfolio.title: Implementation of BM25 Algorithm
portfolio.description: This work was made as a part of the final project in Information Retrieval Course. The purpose of this project was mainly to develop ranked retrieval system based on medical records database

portfolio.title: 3D Volume Estimation using Numerical Method
portfolio.description: The main goal of this project is to perform volume estimation given particular image of three-dimensional shape using the principle of Numerical Method while minimizing the usage of third-party libraries
